channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Stemming the Superbug Tide - Just A Few Dollars More
item.description: Stemming the Superbug Tide - Just A Few Dollars More by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Wednesday, 7 November 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: Global Outlook on Financing for Sustainable Development 2019 - Time to Face the Challenge
item.description: Global Outlook on Financing for Sustainable Development 2019 - Time to Face the Challenge by Development Co-operation Directorate has an embargo on Monday, 12 November 2018, 16:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).

item.title: OECD Economic Outlook, Volume 2018 Issue 2 - Preliminary version
item.description: OECD Economic Outlook, Volume 2018 Issue 2 - Preliminary version by Economics Department has an embargo on Wednesday, 21 November 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).

item.title: OECD-Wirtschaftsausblick, Ausgabe 2018/2 - Vorläufige Ausgabe
item.description: OECD-Wirtschaftsausblick, Ausgabe 2018/2 - Vorläufige Ausgabe by Economics Department has an embargo on Wednesday, 21 November 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).

item.title: Perspectives économiques de l'OCDE, Volume 2018 Numéro 2 - Version préliminaire
item.description: Perspectives économiques de l'OCDE, Volume 2018 Numéro 2 - Version préliminaire by Economics Department has an embargo on Wednesday, 21 November 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Spain 2018
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Spain 2018 by Economics Department has an embargo on Thursday, 22 November 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).

item.title: Revenue Statistics 2018
item.description: Revenue Statistics 2018 by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Thursday, 29 November 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Revenue Statistics in Asian and Pacific Economies
item.description: Revenue Statistics in Asian and Pacific Economies by Development Centre, Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Thursday, 29 November 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).
item.oe:directorate: Development Centre, Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Statistiques des recettes publiques 2018
item.description: Statistiques des recettes publiques 2018 by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Thursday, 29 November 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: SME and Entrepreneurship Policy in Kazakhstan 2018
item.description: SME and Entrepreneurship Policy in Kazakhstan 2018 by Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs and Local Development has an embargo on Wednesday, 5 December 2018, 0:01 Paris time (GMT+01:00).
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs and Local Development
